linesOfText.text: My best self is my heart self.
Wherever I go, it tags along.

It's beside me when I wake up from a sweet
dream and when I pop out of bed...

...and s-l-i-d-e into furry
slippers. It jumps up too,
and giggles because my
slippers tickle.

My heart self
helps me pick
out something
happy to wear.

When I eat pancakes,
it smacks its maple lips.

I peddle fast on my way to and from
school. My heart self whistles in the wind.

On Saturday mornings as I feed
the ducks, my heart self dances.

It reminds me to
help my friends
and share my treasures.

I often ask my heart self what
would be best. It helps me
stay out of trouble!

My heart self gives
hugs to old people...
...kisses to babies,...

...and changes sadness
to sunshine.

Grandma's heart self
is as soft as her
kitty cat.

Daddy's heart self
is so strong, it lifts
me up to the sky.

My mommy's heart
self is as sweet as
the treats she makes
for my birthday.
Heart selves cheer me up when I'm lonely...

...or turn my frown
upside down.

They can help me solve problems
and even find things!
They love me when I'm not feeling lovable.

My heart self is my best self,
and I know it very well.

It's the part that can be shared. Its light
and love are with me always!
